Our Services

Comprehensive infrastructure solutions for your project needs

Featured Services

Specialized Solutions

Power Transmission

Complete EPC solutions for transmission line foundations, monopole erection, lattice tower installation, and HT/LT stringing across 66kV, 132kV, 220kV, and 400kV voltage levels.

  • ● Transmission line foundations
  • ● Monopole & lattice tower erection
  • ● Heavy lifting with telescopic cranes
  • ● HT/LT stringing work
Learn More →

Pile Foundation

High-performance pile foundation solutions for large-scale infrastructure and power transmission projects. From 600mm to 4500mm diameter piles with advanced machinery.

  • ● Large-diameter pile boring (2200mm-4500mm)
  • ● RIG, TMR, WINCH & manual pile systems
  • ● Metro, bridge & monopole foundations
  • ● Material supply & execution
Learn More →

Complete Solutions

What We Do

01

Power Transmission Erection

Dwizzy Infra specializes in complex power transmission erection projects, including the heavy lifting and installation of monopoles across multiple circuits with voltage levels of 66KV, 132KVA, 220KVA, and 400KVA. Using state-of-the-art telescopic cranes, our team expertly handles the challenging task of erecting these structures at heights of up to 75 meters. With a focus on precision and safety, Dwizzy Infra ensures that each project is completed efficiently, meeting the highest industry standards.

02

Pile Foundation Work

At Dwizzy Infra, we excel in delivering comprehensive pile foundation services for high-capacity power transmission projects. Recently, we undertook the monopole foundation construction for 220 KVA, 132 KVA, and 400 KVA voltage capacities for esteemed clients like Torrent Power, Bajel Projects, and Bajaj Electricals Limited. Our scope of work included the construction of robust 220 KVA monopole tower foundations, along with the supply of high-quality construction materials. The foundation boring was executed with precision, adhering to specifications with diameters ranging from 2200MM to 4500MM, ensuring stability and durability for these critical infrastructure projects.

03

Crafting Special Cages

Renowned for our exceptional craftsmanship, Dwizzy Infra specializes in fabricating robust special cages designed specifically for construction projects. Our cages are meticulously crafted to ensure unmatched durability and compliance with the highest safety protocols. Each cage is tailored to meet the unique demands of the project, providing reliable support and enhancing structural integrity. With a commitment to quality and precision, we deliver solutions that not only meet but exceed industry standards, making us a trusted partner in the successful execution of complex construction endeavors.
